title: Think Gravel Cycling Is a Recent Phenomenon? A 60-Year-Old Frame Says Otherwise.
content:
Widely regarded as the first depiction of a mountain bike, John Finley Scott's pioneering design was almost identical to what we now call the gravel bike.

Read the full article at Think Gravel Cycling Is a Recent Phenomenon? A 60-Year-Old Frame Says Otherwise. on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
